name: Rock: Your Body
description:
A short planetary exploration game.
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Yes, it is inspired by Justin Timberlake.

Written for Into Games design workout challenge: 
"This week we’d like your imaginations to run wild and for you to write about exploring a new planet! It’s up to you whether you create a descriptive piece, or try out making a choice-driven narrative adventure using a tool such as Twine."
